name: Step on Miley - Don't Step On White Wrecking Ball Tile
name_original: Step on Miley - Don't Step On White Wrecking Ball Tile
description:
********** Free Miley Tile Game! ************

******** Addicting Tile Stepping Fun **********

Looking for some intense tile-stepping action? This awesome tile game is sure to get you hooked.

Test your reflexes against time and movement. Tap on the wrecking ball tile and the game is over. Keep stepping on Miley to get the farthest at the fastest amount of time.

This is a difficult game yet fun an amazingly addictive. Your speed and accuracy is what it takes to win!

Can you beat your own score?

Features:

* Simplistic user interface
* Cute and colorful graphics
* Play with your friends
* Multiple difficulty levels
* Fun for all ages

Flex those fingers and get your game on!

Download FREE Today!
